## Plugin Name

A short name for the plugin (e.g., "Prometheus Exporter", "Slack Notifier").

## Description

What would this plugin do? What problem does it solve?

## Use Case

Who would use this plugin and in what scenario?

## Integration Points

Which NetVantage interfaces would it use?
- [ ] HTTPProvider (REST API routes)
- [ ] GRPCProvider (gRPC services)
- [ ] EventSubscriber (react to events)
- [ ] HealthChecker (health reporting)
- [ ] Other:

## External Dependencies

Does this require external services, APIs, or libraries?

Any examples, mockups, or references to similar tools.
